                        .   Plot Outline    .                       


                     ~ ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ ~                    


    The sleazy book dealer Corso (Depp) is hired by the obscure     


    obsessive Balkan to find the only other two copies of his       


    rare book in existence. The book is called 'The Nine Gates      


    of the Kingdom of Shadows', and Balkan wants to authenticate    


    his copy of this 17th century occult work, said to have been    


    written by the devil. And thus begins an almost 'Angel          


    heart'ish escapade, filled with physical and supernatural       


    catalysts and obstacles
